hero.title: About Nymphette Tours
hero.subtitle: Creating unforgettable travel experiences for over 25 years with passion, expertise, and dedication

values.title: Our Mission
values.description: To make travel accessible, enjoyable, and transformative for everyone, creating connections between cultures and unforgettable memories that last a lifetime.

values.title: Our Vision
values.description: To be the world's most trusted travel partner, inspiring people to explore, discover, and connect with the beauty and diversity of our planet.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Excellence, integrity, safety, and customer satisfaction guide everything we do. We believe in sustainable tourism that benefits local communities.

story.title: Our Journey
paragraphs: Founded in 1999 by travel enthusiast Rajesh Sharma, Nymphette Tours began as a small family business with a simple dream: to help people discover the world's most beautiful destinations.

What started as organizing local tours has grown into a comprehensive travel company serving thousands of travelers annually. Our commitment to personalized service, attention to detail, and creating meaningful travel experiences has remained unchanged.
Today, we're proud to be one of India's most trusted travel partners, offering everything from intimate honeymoon packages to large group adventures across six continents.

milestones.event: Founded Nymphette Tours with a vision to make travel accessible to everyone
Expanded to international destinations, serving 10+ countries
Launched group tour packages, connecting travelers worldwide
Adapted to digital platforms, ensuring safe travel during challenges
Celebrating 25 years with 50,000+ happy travelers served

achievements.title: Best Travel Agency 2023
achievements.description: Awarded by India Travel Awards for excellence in customer service

achievements.title: 50,000+ Happy Customers
achievements.description: Successfully served over 50,000 travelers with memorable experiences

achievements.title: 500+ Destinations
achievements.description: Covering major tourist destinations across all continents
